translation.msg_start:
Hi, I am your Runes wallet and Red Envelope (RE) Assistant!
How to create and send RE?

—STEP 1. Snatch RE in groups, or deposit Runes to your RE wallet address.

—STEP 2. Create RE.
/create [Amount][Shares]
e.g. /create 1000 5
Create RE in this private chat.

—STEP 3. Send the RE you created to a group or a friend. Send me to the group or friend before sending your RE to them.
/send [No.] This is the number of your RE. You can see all your RE numbers by typing /list
e.g. /send 1003
translation.msg_help:
Commands available in private chat.
/start
Shows welcome menu and dashboard

/wallet
Shows the balance of your Runes and/or ICP assets. Shows your RE wallet address

/create [Amount][Shares]
e.g. /create 1000 5

/list
Shows all your created REs and their RE identification No.

/send [No.]
Send RE to a group or friend.
e.g. /send 871

/revoke [No.]
RE’s expire after 24 hours. Revoke an RE and any remaining Runes return to your wallet.
e.g. /revoke 871

/transfer [Amount][Address]
Transfer RICH to an ICP or BTC Address. Transferring to BTC costs a bit more.
e.g. /transfer 1000 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe
e.g. /transfer 1000 [BTC Address]

/transfer ICP [Amount] [Address]
Transfer ICP to ICP Address
e.g. /transfer ICP 35 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe

/preswap [Amount]
Trial swap $RICH →$ICP shows exchange rate and outcome
e.g. /preswap 100
Trial swap $ICP →$RICH shows exchange rate and outcome
e.g. /preswap ICP 0.5

/swap [Amount]
Executes swap $RICH →$ICP
e.g. /swap 100
Executes swap $ICP →$RICH
e.g. /swap ICP 0.5

/help
Show full command list.
translation.msg_how_to_create:
Create RE command:

/create [Amount][Shares]
e.g. /create 500 5

Add the F flag to create a fixed amount in each share.
e.g. /create 500 5 F

You can also add a blessing text of up to 140 characters.
e.g. /create 500 5 F Good luck in the New Year!
translation.msg_how_to_transfer:
Transfer Command

/transfer [Amount][Address]
Transfer RICH to an ICP or BTC Address. Transferring to BTC costs a bit more.
e.g. /transfer 1000 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe
e.g. /transfer 1000 [BTC Address]

/transfer ICP [Amount] [Address]
Transfer ICP to ICP Address
e.g. /transfer ICP 35 kqwog-a4rvg-b7zzv-4skt7-fzosi-gtaub-xdkpi-4ywbu-mz23j-rfvoq-sqe
translation.msg_how_to_preswap:
Preswap command:

/preswap [Amount]
Trial swap to show outcomes.
e.g. /preswap 100

Add ICP before [Amount] to indicate you want to swap $ICP to $RICH
e.g. /preswap ICP 0.5
translation.msg_how_to_swap:
Swap command:

/swap [Amount]
Execute swap.
e.g. /swap 100

Add ICP before [Amount] to indicate you want to swap $ICP to $RICH
e.g. /swap ICP 0.5
translation.msg_wallet_notice:
Cross chain transfer $RICH from Bitcoin to your RE Wallet with the Omnity Hub at https://www.omnity.network/
Note: that while your RE Telegram wallet is easy to use, it is not suitable for storing large amounts of assets.
translation.msg_snatch_suffix: Play with RE by chatting with me! @{{botname}}
translation.msg_send: Select the user or group you want to send to
translation.msg_create: RE {{id}} created. {{fee}} fee charged. {{icrc1_fee}} collected by token ledger.
translation.msg_create_insufficient: Insufficient balance, you need {{amount}} in wallet to create.
translation.msg_create_minimum: A share(Amount/Share) of RE should be >= {{amount}}
translation.msg_create_share: Send RE by sharing the link:
translation.msg_amount_maximum: Amount should be no more than 1M
translation.msg_count_maximum: Share should be no more than 1000
translation.msg_send_failed_user:
You shared RE failed. He/She is not a friend with Omnity REBot.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} with your friends
translation.msg_send_failed_group:
You shared RE failed. Omnity REBot @{{botname}} is not in the group.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} to group administrators
translation.msg_preswap_notice: Execute /swap quickly if the price is good because it keeps changing. Swap here is only for casual usage. For serious trading, please visit https://www.helixmarkets.io/ or https://iclight.io/
translation.reapp_error_1101: The token is not in the whitelist
translation.reapp_error_1102: The expiration time is too short
translation.reapp_error_1103: The token allowance is not enough
translation.reapp_error_1113: The RE {{id}} cannot be withdrawn until it expires (24 hours)
translation.swap_error_TooSmallFunds: Amount is not enough to cover fee
